response.original_title: The Simply Grand Quigley Band: Giggles and Goof Ups at the Gazebo
response.overview: When the governor comes to town, Mr. Quigley's band provides the music. But the band members don't handle long, boring speeches well. Meanwhile, Yuki learns respect for other people's belongings when she tries to work in her Grandpa's musical instrument repair shop. The kids enjoy a lesson on good phone manners and the story of Eli and Samuel shows the children where all respect and good manners ought to come from respecting God.
response.title: The Simply Grand Quigley Band: Giggles and Goof Ups at the Gazebo
